subject: Re: pipinsurance.com.au
preview: Hi Megs,  No problem at all , glad I could help!  Let me know if there’s anything else you need, I’m always happy to assist.

full_threads.body:
Hi Megs,

No problem at all , glad I could help!

Let me know if there’s anything else you need, I’m always happy to assist.

Thank you very much, we are sorted now.
We will reinstate 2FA when we are ready.

Thanks so much for that!

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au



www.sgua.com.au



www.pi-plus.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi Megs,

Thanks so much for giving that a go and sharing the error message.

We’ve temporarily disabled the WordPress login security, so you should be able to log in now with your usual details.

Once you're back in, feel free to set up the Wordfence login security again whenever you're ready.

Let us know if there's anything else you need, always happy to help!

Hi Allie!

Thanks so much for trying that.

Unfortunately not, I tried my old password and tried to reset the password.
I get an error message per the below -


Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au

Hi Megs,

Thanks for your note!

Here’s a quick update:
  • Google indexing: robots.txt is still active, so nothing will be indexed right now
    → Check it here
  • 🔐 Login issue:
    • We’ve temporarily disabled the authenticator
    • We were able to log in successfully on our end
    • Could you please try again using your old login?

Let us know how you go, happy to jump in if it’s still not working!

Hello Allie!

Thanks so much for that - also just checking nothing will index with Googl?
https://pipinsurance.com.au/wp-login.php?backend&redirect=false

I was able to get in using my old logins but when I forced 2FA for all user levels it logged me out and won't let me log back in.
(It's not showing an authentication box).

Could you kindly assist?

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au



www.sgua.com.au



www.pi-plus.com.au

If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi Megs,

Thanks so much for confirming.

Just a quick update:
  • The site is now pointed to the main domain: https://pipinsurance.com.au
  • The “Coming Soon” page is still live, just let us know when you’d like that removed
  • We also noticed a small reference to the old subdomain (pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud ) on the homepage, which we’ve now removed

Let us know if you spot anything else, we’re always happy to jump in and help.

That's great news thank you so much Allie - confirming our team won't make any changes until you have advised all on the new domain.

Thank you so much,

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au

Hi Megs,

Hope your morning’s going well so far!

Just a quick heads-up that we’re all set to push the site live this morning at 11am AEST / 9am AWST, as planned.

The "Coming Soon" page will remain in place so only logged-in testers can access the site.

Once live, we’ll:
  • Check all CTA buttons
  • Review the header and footer for any staging links

We’ll confirm once everything’s live and looking good on our end.

Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like us to keep an eye on!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi there Allie,

Thank you for your patience.

Confirming that the site is now ready to be moved across from the staging site to the live link (with the "Coming soon" page remaining active so only logged in testers can access it).

Would it be possible to do the switchover tomorrow morning around 9am AWST / 11am AEST?

If this is possible, please let us know and we will note to the team a dev freeze for the period to ensure nothing gets lost between.

As per the last time, please can you double check any CTA buttons and both the header and footer - as some items reference a direct link - are changed over. Our team can then go in and test for any remaining references of the prior staging site(s) are all switched across.

Thanks so much in advance,

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au
